verses.verse: The Pharisees <WG5330> also <WG2532> with the Sadducees <WG4523> came <WG4334>, and <WG2532> tempting <WG3985> desired <WG1905> him <WG846> that he would shew <WG1925> them <WG846> a sign <WG4592> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772>.

<WG1161>He answered <WG611> and said <WG2036> unto them <WG846>, When it is <WG1096> evening <WG3798> , ye say <WG3004> , It will be fair weather <WG2105> : for <WG1063> the sky <WG3772> is red <WG4449> .

And <WG2532> in the morning <WG4404> , It will be foul weather <WG5494> to day <WG4594> : for <WG1063> the sky <WG3772> is red <WG4449> and lowring <WG4768> . And <WG2532> when his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> were come <WG2064> to <WG1519> the other side <WG4008>, they had forgotten <WG1950> to take <WG2983> bread <WG740>.

¶ Then <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> said <WG2036> unto them <WG846>, Take heed <WG3708> and <WG2532> beware <WG4337> of <WG575> the leaven <WG2219> of the Pharisees <WG5330> and <WG2532> of the Sadducees <WG4523> .
And <WG1161> they reasoned <WG1260> among <WG1722> themselves <WG1438>, saying <WG3004>, It is because <WG3754> we have taken <WG2983> no <WG3756> bread <WG740>.

Which when <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> perceived <WG1097>, he said <WG2036> unto them <WG846>, O ye of little faith <WG3640> , why <WG5101> reason ye <WG1260> among <WG1722> yourselves <WG1438> , because <WG3754> ye have brought <WG2983> no <WG3756> bread <WG740> ?

Do ye <WG3539> not yet <WG3768> understand <WG3539> , neither <WG3761> remember <WG3421> the five <WG4002> loaves <WG740> of the five thousand <WG4000> , and <WG2532> how many <WG4214> baskets <WG2894> ye took up <WG2983> ?
Neither <WG3761> the seven <WG2033> loaves <WG740> of the four thousand <WG5070> , and <WG2532> how many <WG4214> baskets <WG4711> ye took up <WG2983> ?

How <WG4459> is it that <WG3754> ye do <WG3539> not <WG3756> understand <WG3539> that I spake <WG2036> it not <WG3756> to you <WG5213> concerning <WG4012> bread <WG740> , that ye should beware <WG4337> of <WG575> the leaven <WG2219> of the Pharisees <WG5330> and <WG2532> of the Sadducees <WG4523> ?

Then <WG5119> understood they <WG4920> how that <WG3754> he bade <WG2036> them not <WG3756> beware <WG4337> of <WG575> the leaven <WG2219> of bread <WG740>, but <WG235> of <WG575> the doctrine <WG1322> of the Pharisees <WG5330> and <WG2532> of the Sadducees <WG4523>.

¶ When <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> came <WG2064> into <WG1519> the coasts <WG3313> of Caesarea <WG2542> Philippi <WG5376>, he asked <WG2065> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101>, saying <WG3004>, Whom <WG5101> do men <WG444> say <WG3004> that I <WG3165> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> am <WG1511> ?

And <WG1161> Simon <WG4613> Peter <WG4074> answered <WG611> and said <WG2036>, Thou <WG4771> art <WG1488> the Christ <WG5547>, the Son <WG5207> of the living <WG2198> God <WG2316>.

Then <WG5119> charged he <WG1291> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> that <WG2443> they should tell <WG2036> no man <WG3367> that <WG3754> he <WG846> was <WG2076> Jesus <WG2424> the Christ <WG5547>.

¶ From <WG575> that time forth <WG5119> began <WG756> Jesus <WG2424> to shew <WG1166> unto his <WG846> disciples <WG3101>, how that <WG3754> he <WG846> must <WG1163> go <WG565> unto <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2414>, and <WG2532> suffer <WG3958> many things <WG4183> of <WG575> the elders <WG4245> and <WG2532> chief priests <WG749> and <WG2532> scribes <WG1122>, and <WG2532> be killed <WG615>, and <WG2532> be raised again <WG1453> the third <WG5154> day <WG2250>.

Then <WG2532> Peter <WG4074> took <WG4355> him <WG846>, and began <WG756> to rebuke <WG2008> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, Be it far <WG2436> from thee <WG4671>, Lord <WG2962>: this <WG5124> shall <WG2071> not <WG3364> be <WG2071> unto thee <WG4671>.

But <WG1161> he turned <WG4762>, and said <WG2036> unto Peter <WG4074>, Get thee <WG5217> behind <WG3694> me <WG3450> , Satan <WG4567> : thou <WG1488> art <WG3754> an offence <WG4625> unto me <WG3450> : for thou savourest <WG5426> not <WG3756> the things <WG3588> that be of God <WG2316> , but <WG235> those that be of men <WG444> .

¶ Then <WG5119> said <WG2036> Jesus <WG2424> unto his <WG846> disciples <WG3101>, If any <WG1536> man will <WG2309> come <WG2064> after <WG3694> me <WG3450> , let him deny <WG533> himself <WG1438> , and <WG2532> take up <WG142> his <WG846> cross <WG4716> , and <WG2532> follow <WG190> me <WG3427> .

For <WG1063> whosoever <WG3739> <WG302> will <WG2309> save <WG4982> his <WG846> life <WG5590> shall lose <WG622> it <WG846> : and <WG1161> whosoever <WG3739> <WG302> will lose <WG622> his <WG846> life <WG5590> for <WG1752> my <WG1700> sake <WG1752> shall find <WG2147> it <WG846> .

For <WG1063> what <WG5101> is a man <WG444> profited <WG5623> , if <WG1437> he shall gain <WG2770> the whole <WG3650> world <WG2889> , and <WG1161> lose <WG2210> his own <WG846> soul <WG5590> ? or <WG2228> what <WG5101> shall a man <WG444> give <WG1325> in exchange <WG465> for his <WG846> soul <WG5590> ?

For <WG1063> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> shall <WG3195> come <WG2064> in <WG1722> the glory <WG1391> of his <WG846> Father <WG3962> with <WG3326> his <WG846> angels <WG32> ; and <WG2532> then <WG5119> he shall reward <WG591> every man <WG1538> according <WG2596> to his <WG846> works <WG4234> .
